email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. I am pleased to present you with a freight offer for the shipment of 150,000 MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HAWK, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 25-30 October 2023, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the prompt offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 17.50 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 20,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 25-30 October 2023, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 18.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Tubarao on 25th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Excellent! Recap attached. Thanks for the business!

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarao
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN HAWK
Freight: USD 18.00/MT
Laycan: 25-30 Oct 2023
Demurrage: USD 20,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers
